text: (He imana rakhanaryanno!) Tumacyakarita (hajarata) ibrahima ani tyancya sathidarammadhye phara uttama namuna ahe, jevha tya sarvanni apalya janasamuhala spasta sabdanta sangitale ki amhi tumacyapasuna ani jyanci tumhi allahakherija aradhana karata, tya sarvampasuna purnapane vibhakta ahota. Amhi tumacya (srad'dheca) inkara karato ani toparyanta tumhi allahacya eka asanyavara imana rakhata nahi (toparyanta) amacya va tumacya daramyana nehamikarita kapata ani satrutva nirmana jhale. Parantu ibrahima apalya pityasa ase mhanale hote ki mi tumacyasathi ksama-yacana avasya karina ani tumacyasathi mala allahasamora kasalahi adhikara nahi. He amacya palanakartya! Tujhyavaraca amhi bharavasa rakhala ahe1 ani tujhyacakade amhi ruju hoto, ani tujhyakadeca paratuna yayace ahe
